data.quote: Life is not just one single path. There are a hundred, a thousand, and ten thousand paths.
data.author: Ryoma Sakamoto

data.quote: You can't be sure about anything until you see it.
data.author: Ryoma Sakamoto

data.quote: Since we were born as human beings, we should have as big dreams as the Pacific Ocean.
data.author: Ryoma Sakamoto

data.quote: Let people say what they want to say. Only I know what I want to do.
data.author: Ryoma Sakamoto

data.quote: You should never abondon the path you love or are good at, no matter what the circumstance you are at.
data.author: Ryoma Sakamoto
